snippet: Gov. Chris Christie, ramping up his tough talk on foreign policy, said that as president he would enforce a no-fly zone against Russian airstrikes in Syria and tell Moscow: “Don’t try me.”
abstract: Gov. Chris Christie, ramping up his tough talk on foreign policy, said that as president he would enforce a no-fly zone against Russian airstrikes in Syria and tell Moscow: “Don’t try me.”

headline.main: Calling Obama a ‘Weakling,’ Chris Christie Says He Would Shoot Down Russian Planes Over Syria
